chaski.api

Interface ChaskiConstants


  • public interface ChaskiConstants

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String AP_STATE
      Key to retrieve the state of a WiFi access point
      static java.lang.String AP_STATE_ACTION
      Used as action indicators for changed access point state
      static int AP_STATE_DISABLED
      State in which a WiFi access point is disabled Usage requires modulo 10 to avoid problems since constants values changed in Android 4.0.
      static int AP_STATE_ENABLED
      State in which a WiFi access point is enabled Usage requires modulo 10 to avoid problems since constants values changed in Android 4.0.
      static java.lang.String CLIENTS_STATE_ACTION
      Used as action indicators for client related action
      static int CONNECTED_STATE
      State in which a WiFi station is connected
      static int CONNECTION_ERROR_STATE
      State in which the connection of a WiFi station is an erroneous state
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_STATE
      Key to retrieve the connection state of a Wi-Fi station
      static java.lang.String CONNECTION_STATE_ACTION
      Used as action indicators for changed access point connection states
      static int DISCONNECTED_STATE
      State in which a WiFi station is disconnected
      static java.lang.String KEY_CLIENTS
      Key to retrieve connected WiFi stations to a WiFi access points
      static java.lang.String KEY_CONNECTION_ERROR_DIAGNOSE
      Key for messages related to unsuccessful connection trials
      static java.lang.String KEY_IP_ADDRESS
      Key to retrieve IP address
      static java.lang.String KEY_OPERATION_STRING
      Key to retrieve a value, which has originally been passed as an input parameter for a method that sends the broadcast containing this value.
      static java.lang.String KEY_SSID
      Network name of connected access point
      static java.lang.String KEY_STRING_ARRAY_OF_CLIENTS
      Key for retrieving array of IP addresses of clients

      • AP_STATE_DISABLED

        static final int AP_STATE_DISABLED
        State in which a WiFi access point is disabled Usage requires modulo 10 to avoid problems since constants values changed in Android 4.0. Normally 1 but since 4.0 it is 11
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AP_STATE_ENABLED

        static final int AP_STATE_ENABLED
        State in which a WiFi access point is enabled Usage requires modulo 10 to avoid problems since constants values changed in Android 4.0. Normally 3 but since it is 4.0 it is 13
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
